title: Cinematic Drone Shot
prompt: Aerial drone footage flying over a misty mountain valley at sunrise, smooth cinematic movement, epic landscape

title: Product Reveal
prompt: Modern smartphone rotating on a pedestal against a gradient background, smooth 360-degree rotation, commercial product video

title: Abstract Motion
prompt: Flowing abstract liquid shapes morphing and changing colors, vibrant gradient transitions, mesmerizing motion graphics

title: Nature Timelapse
prompt: Timelapse of clouds moving over a mountain peak, dramatic sky, natural lighting changes, landscape cinematography

title: Social Media Reel
prompt: Fast-paced montage of urban street scenes, people walking, cars passing, trendy vertical video for social media

title: Tech Animation
prompt: Futuristic holographic interface with glowing particles and data streams, sci-fi technology visualization, blue and cyan colors

title: Ocean Waves
prompt: Slow motion ocean waves crashing on a tropical beach, crystal clear water, peaceful coastal scene

title: City Night Drive
prompt: POV driving through a neon-lit city at night, bokeh lights, cinematic travel footage, cyberpunk aesthetic
